name: Footbrawl Playground
description: Footbrawl Playground is a Physics Playground where you can goof around with a Friend, spawn NPCS, Place Traps and some more stuff.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800 / ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB NVIDIA 460 / AMD Radeon 5870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
